title: Your Way Out
prompt:
The manuals unveiled the presence of Luminite, a unique fuel utilized within the spacecraft. The physical switch to activate the ignition systems, however, is located in a hidden location within the spacecraft. An XOR tool (present therein) reveals the location if its output has all bits (10 bits) set to 1. The crew must find the location.
https://maxxor.trailblaze.space
author: cyb3rpunk_b4ddi3
